name: Executable Education
description:
Email: Tech Support

This is the Last time we need to tell you all to stop downloading attachments sent to your email!

  1. The last time you did that, we had 2 casualties..

    Anyways, take a look at this really cool attachment:

    [         Executable Education.exe            ] 

    PS Note - Computer not working? Turn off your caps lock!
    Not recommended for ultra-widescreen (playable, not ideal) - resolution can be changed in settings.

    Full settings menu  / Save (per level)  added.



    [Controls]
    Move - WASD
    Look - Mouse 
    Zoom - Right Click  
    Click (PC) - Left Click 
    Enter PC - E Key
    Leave PC - ESC Key
    Pause Menu - Enter / Return

    [Playtime / Difficulty]
    30min - 1h30min  (varies)

    [Dev]
    Shroudy Software 
    www.shrowdysoftware.com

    Dev time - 2 weeks 
    We had a blast after the last game, that we wanted to put something out a bit bigger and a bit more of a full packaged experience. We started small and let the scope creep take us on a journey :)

    Team/CC attribution detailed in in-game credits.
    Love letter to Orion/Sega from our childhood!

    Enjoy!

Update 1 - 1/9/2022 

- Easy mode added (PARTY TIME ) - Office/School only
- Player collision fixed
- Some sounds fixed

Update 2 - 1/9/2022 

- Easy mode expanded on, we're going to keep working on this and having some fun >:)
